Develop a luggage tag that can be used to track the location of the luggage in real-time.
Create a luggage tag that is designed to be waterproof and durable, making it ideal for outdoor travel.
Develop a luggage tag that can be used to store important documents such as travel insurance, visa, and boarding passes.
Create a luggage tag that is designed to be easily visible, with bright colors and reflective materials to help prevent loss.
Develop a luggage tag that can be used to track the weight and size of the luggage, making it easier to avoid overpacking and to ensure that the luggage is within airline size restrictions.
